name: WELDING GREEK INSTITUTE
goal:
The Welding Greek Institute is the representative organisation for Greece to the European Welding Federation - EWF and IIW as well.
We are offering training of welding coordination personnel, inspectors and WELDERS.
We are interesting in research and development of knowledge, regarding training inovations, materials, energy saving, environmental issues, social initiatives for unenployment, etc..
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Information Society, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Quality, Environmental Protection, Safety at Work, Atni-bribery and data Protection policies, are the main polices to be followed by Welding Greek Institute.
